SEARCH
Package main.java.warzone.entities

Class Player

java.lang.Object
main.java.warzone.entities.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the Warzone main.java.game. This class encapsulates the properties and behavior of a player in the Warzone main.java.game, including the player's name, owned countries, number of armies, and orders. Players can issue deploy orders to reinforce their territories or attack orders to conquer new territories.
